body.p:
Northern Bank of Kentucky,
Lexington, Nov 20. 1862.
Govr J F Robinson
Dear Sir

I wish you would commission James T Davidson Notary Public for this County. He is our only clerk at present, and in the absence or sickness of our Teller, it is often important to have a notary in Bank.
